storyInfo: At the after party, the crowd chatters about the past and a corporation makes a sponsorship offer. The next match is close at hand.

attributes.content: Cheers—!
attributes.name: Everyone

attributes.content: Congrats, kid! That was a beautiful match! You’re much stronger than V now!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Yes, she is, but who made you the judge!?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Huuhh?!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Why are you two fighting again...? Hey now, stop it. You’re disturbing the other customers.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Ahaha... They’re arm wrestling already...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: That was a good one indeed, kid. This one is for you.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Ah... thank you!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Not only did you manage to find Szewczyk’s weakness, you even finished him in one blow. You did really well.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: The fight lasted for almost twenty minutes. Maria had been at a disadvantage during most of the fight, but she turned the tables on him with just one crucial strike—
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: —Very well done.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: I-It wasn’t anything special... I wouldn’t have been able to do it if he wasn’t wearing a flawed set of armor...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I’d never heard of the model Jack 2 before... If the cooling system could paralyze the armor even for a short time, then it’s definitely still a prototype.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: —That said, Szewczyk’s an experienced competition knight, and endorsing untested products actually isn’t that uncommon at all. He also managed to hide the armor’s weaknesses well.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Don’t be so humble. It’s barbaric, but the Major has always been about results and results only.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: O-Okay...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Maria!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Yes, ma’am!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Don’t get too ahead of yourself!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Right!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You need to know how to control your emotions—Don’t just act normal, you need to proactively reflect on yourself and normalize your emotions...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...The less you think complacency’s an issue, the more dangerous it is. It’s very difficult to realize yourself just what victory does to your emotions...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: And that carelessness... will... be the end of you!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: G-Got it!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Auntie? Are you drunk?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: No! And don’t call me 'Auntie!'
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: —I won!!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Sod it, Kowal. How did you get this buff in just half a year?!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: I’ve been fixing pipes. You’ve got a problem with that?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Kowal, Vogelweide, is Zofia...?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria... Call me 'Auntie'... one more time... I’ll... mess ya upp...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Yeah... Looks like she’s really drunk. Don’t see that often.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: I... I’m not... drunk!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Fine, whatever you say. Maria, take your aunt to the couch in the back. Let her sleep it off there.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Eh... O-Okay... Auntie, lift your leg up...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Who’s yer 'Auntie?!'
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Zofia can usually really hold her liquor... Well, not that she can drink as much as me.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Yeah, yeah, yeah. Just because you had drinks with a few folks from Yen once, you’re all full of yourself? Have you no shame, trying to beat a young lady at downing booze?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: She’s under a lot of pressure... It’s her first time watching a match as a coach, and she had to listen to Greatmouth Mob jabber on and on.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: That brings back memories... *Sigh*, I’ve been like this ever since Maria won. I guess I’m old now.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: What are you talking about? We’re all about the same age!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: I guess that means I’m actually old, then.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Hey.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: ...Yeah, how long ago was it when Zofia first stepped into the arena? Twelve years ago? Fifteen?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: How old you are is none of my business, and I don’t remember exactly when, but Zofia’s not that old...
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: It was nine years ago, wasn’t it? The Blood Knight, The Radiant Knight, The Black Knight... It was three seasons ago.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: The Black Knight... That Caprinae, huh? Feels like a lifetime ago.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Well, she won the three Majors before that too. The media likes to treat her like some sort of emblem of that generation or something.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Oh, the three-time consecutive winner?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Yeah, normally, they don’t pick words that common when they come up with titles, lest they get repeated and complicate things.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: But that Leithanien lass. She actually deserves the title 'Black'. She’s a monster, no mistake.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: I heard she’s working for some large company outside the country, tsk, tsk.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Someone like her’s no knight... Not in my book.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: I-I see...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Maria, has Zofia ever told you anything about her career in the Major?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: No. There are the videos and stats from each season, but she hasn’t told me anything herself...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I think Auntie Zofia made it to the top 16 that year, and during the round of 16...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: That’s right. She was heavily wounded.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Her opponent was the 'Fissure'. That reminds me, did he enter the Major this year?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Why are we talking about the past? We’re here to celebrate Maria’s win!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: That wasn’t a very fun story anyway. Let’s move on to something else!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Actually... I’m kinda curious about that...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I managed to win, but it doesn’t seem like Zofia’s very happy about it... She didn’t even say anything and went straight to drinking...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I’m sure she thought really hard about all this for me... I don’t want to let her down... so I want to know more about her past and how she feels about everything.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Well... You’re just like your sister when it comes to that.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: That’s right. You’re always quick to notice if something’s amiss, and you always try to do something about it.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: That last attack of the match. Did Zofia teach you that?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: N-No, actually—
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You copied Margaret’s move?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Eh? Oh, umm... Yeah... was it obvious?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Hahaha, of course. You two are so alike! And I’ll never forget that day.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: The miracle of the Radiant Knight, the youngest ever champion. She accomplished all that without help from anyone else.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: And she doesn’t show it, but Zofia actually really looks up to Margaret.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: She was just a lady-in-waiting to your family, but she really tried her hardest. She even had us old farts help her train...
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: She entered the preliminaries, won, and made it into the Major... From the beginning all the way to the end, she didn’t accept any sponsorship offers, nor did she ever ask anyone for help.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Heh... I even introduced her to a few small businesses I knew back in the day, but she turned down every one of them.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...Those companies are all trash. She made the right call to turn them down.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Shut up. That’s exactly why 'Fissure' defeated Zofia.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: What happened...?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria, a competition knight needs a lot of resources... That’s something you’ll come to know... The weapons and equipment you bring to battle could be the difference between life and death.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Szewczyk probably only lost to you because the armor they made him wear had a design flaw.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Suppose he wore a set of armor that had no flaws at all, maybe even with far superior capabilities. What happens then? Do you think you could’ve won?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...Probably not...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: That’s the kind of opponent Zofia faced. Flawless armor, weapons, and support. The difference between them was immense.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Zofia paid for her own equipment. She perfected her technique all alone, and she made all the connections herself. It was just her, and she fought so hard.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: We never did anything for her except watch her get hurt and throw in the towel.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Was there anything we could’ve done?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Marcin...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: At the very least, you could help Zofia train the kid.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Hahaha, I doubt Maria would want to be coached by ol’ one-armed Marcin, the same man who had a hand in Zofia’s injury, indirectly.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: No, I would love to! I’ve always admired all of you! I mean it!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Hm? It’s not often we get other customers. How unusual...
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: You’ll probably go out of business at this rate.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Excuse me... Are you Maria Nearl, the knightess?
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Uh... That’s right.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Pleased to meet you, Ms. Maria. Do you have time to talk right now?
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Sure, is there something I can do for you?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I’m here to represent the Słoma Corporation... Here is my business card.
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Please accept my apologies. My company’s representative has sent several invitations to your residence, but we have yet to receive a reply. I’m sorry for visiting you here uninvited.
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Oh... uh... I think... there’s a bit of problem with our mailbox... Haha...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: So, did you need something from me?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You see, my company is one of the sponsors of the Eszeweria Knightclub. Its leader was very impressed by your performance against Mr. Szewczyk.
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: As soon as he found out you are not currently affiliated, he wanted to know if you would be interested in a contract with the knightclub, and contacted our business department to facilitate discussion...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: ...They want to sign me?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Yes... and actually, our CEO is very interested in having you on board...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: (Kowal, isn’t Słoma the food company that has straws in their logo?)
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: (You moron. Why don’t you take a look at the logo they stamped on those saltines you’re eating?)
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: (Eszeweria is one of the top 100 knightclubs... Though they’re a bunch of businesspeople more interested in making money from sponsorships and ads than entering competitions...)
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Not only that, but MARTHE Kazimierz’s PR Department has also pledged to cosponsor all of the knightclub’s future developments with Słoma, should you agree to sign with the club.
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: MA-MARTHE!? You mean that MARTHE?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Yes, that’s correct. If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to reach...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Mm... How did I... How long have I been out?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Oh, Zofia, you’re up.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Not that long. You slept for about ten minutes only...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I can’t be napping. We still have to plan out where we’re getting the rest of our points this month—
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...Zofia? I-Is that you?
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Oh. Yeah, I remember you. You’re that young manager at...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: No, not anymore... Now I’m just a... nobody running errands for Słoma...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: I see, so 'Whislash' is Ms. Maria’s coach. All the better.
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: There are many young and enterprising knights like you two on the Eszeweria Knightclub’s roster. The business department has many ways to further your reputation and worth without merely resorting to tournament matches...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: But it sounds like...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...You’ll be something like a star or an idol. Your face will be all over the intercity net, and no one will care about your scores in the competitions anymore. They’ll just be throwing money at whatever they see your face on.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: That’s kinda hard to believe...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: That’s how the industry works. They spend nearly all of their budget on finding spokesmen. Then, they film some phony ads to try to make a buck from the ordinary folks.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: It’s simple, and it’s a lot more effective than you think. Makes you wonder where the problem actually lies.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...That is more or less the case, if put in less flattering terms. However, on behalf of the General Chamber of Commerce, the Słoma company can promise that you will still be conferred both the knighthood and a title.
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: ...What do you want to do?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: This is way too sudden, I...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Honestly... I think it’s okay to accept their offer.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You won’t need to put yourself in harm’s way, and the family will keep its nobility. It’s a good deal. You might even have a bigger garden than me come this time next year.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: But yours is full of nothing but weeds. I’m not sure what I’d do with a garden even bigger than that...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: N-Never mind.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: If you agree right now, we have an agreement here, ready to go. Rest assured, you will find the terms very favorable.
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: I’m sorry... but I don’t want my family crest to become some commercial trinket. At the very least, I don’t want to have to rely on anyone...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...I beg your pardon?
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Maria?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Yeah, I know, Zofia.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I don’t like how Uncle Młynar does things, but I don’t want to bring shame to Margaret and Grandpa’s struggle.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: So... I’m sorry, but I don’t think that is the right path for me to take...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Well... your response is certainly... unexpected...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: H-However, the General Chamber of Commerce has prepared for you an assortment of proposals—Please have a look.
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: The Chamber? Isn’t this usually under the Association’s purview?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Err... I-I’m sure you understand. This is why our CEO insists you join us...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Yeah, thanks... but... I’m sorry, I have to refuse.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Y-Yes, I understand. Right... You refuse... uhh...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Well... Ms. Zofia, Ms. Maria... This isn’t part of the business proposal, but please at least hear me out...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Uh... your teeth are chattering... A-Are you crying? All I did was decline your offer... It’s no big deal!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Uh, n-no... I’m simply hoping that... in the event that anyone else comes to you—Ms. Maria, in particular—with any business propositions, please—
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: —Please seriously consider accepting! I’m begging you. This is very important to us...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: N-Now... please excuse me... before I embarrass myself any more...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Helping other companies out...? That’s a new one.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Yeah... That’s really strange.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: ...Maria, when is your next match?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: In three days.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Who are you up against? Did the Association contact you?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Uh... I guess not?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Let’s go home, Maria. Judging from your performance this time, you still have lots of room for improvement.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Now? We haven’t even started celebrating!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Kowal, let them go.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Zofia, be careful. Keep an eye peeled.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: —Yeah, I got it. Let’s go, Maria.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Okay, wait up—!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Ingra? 'Brassrust' Ingra? The National Council let him go again?
Well, what did you expect? That huge megacorporation has his back... The Victorians he crippled must be peeved.
But well... This is perfect.
Ladies and Gentlemen!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: No promises, no rules, and no limits!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Here, we have two knights, their armor, a battlefield, and nothing else! Rules, conditions, arrangements, protective measures, nothing!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: As the most important preliminary event of the Kazimierz Major, these tryouts have been going on for three months already, and there are still contestants throwing their hats in the ring!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Even so, I dare say, what we’re about to witness today is unlike anything we’ve seen before!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The contestants standing before us now both come from long lines of knights!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Yes, yes, I can hear you hiss. Worry not! This will be among the most entertaining matches you’ve seen, and I put my career and reputation on the line to say that!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: You are bound to start cheering the moment you hear their names! You have my word!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: First, on this side, we have the youngest son of the Ingra family, Olmer Ingra!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: That’s right. He’s the one who been taken to court countless times for crippling anyone who dares cross him, and thanks to the coffers of his countless sponsors has been ruled innocent over and over by the National Council! 'Brassrust' Ingra!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The Butcher of the Field from the Bloodboil Knightclub! The ruthless knight who has never allowed even a single opponent to step out of the ring in one piece!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: He will beat his armor, his rage, and his mercilessness into the heart of each and every one of his opponents! And most likely their skulls, too!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: And on the other side! The other side—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Oh, ooh! One of the oldest knight families, Nearl! Let us say their name out loud! Nearl!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The hero of Kazimierz who outsmarted the Leithaniens all by himself, the Tenebrous Knight who assassinated the king’s traitorous retinue, and, last but not least, the Radiant Knight, the embodiment of shame who was exiled for getting infected!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: All of them came from this family!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: What’s that? Not up for a history lesson? Fine! Well then, who managed to defeat the Roar K.C.’s vanguard, Szewczyk, before she even got her own title?
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Who’s the Roar Arena most popular knight of the month?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Will all this change because of this one match? Will 'Brassrust' bash in this pretty little face of hers?
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Let us welcome—Maria Nearl—!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: What will be the outcome of this battle? Who will reign victorious? Pick up the terminals next to your seats and start voting!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: You know the rules! Your monetary support won’t influence the match’s outcome, but it will directly influence whether your wallet’s empty or brimming with cash!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: —Maria!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Let’s forfeit this match... okay? Just listen to me this once. Just this match...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...Auntie?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I’ve already entered the battlefield... As a knight, I mustn’t back down.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...You’re right.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Go get him, Maria.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Show everyone here what you’re made of.
attributes.name: Zofia
